content: Hello,I am Aakash and I work for https://CryptoLegacy.ai a Digital Legacy Platform thatâ€™s currently in stealth mode.We are building a SMART Contract powered Estate Planning platform that enables instant inheritance for crypto/NFT and all digital assets.We just launched alpha version and, now we are building our community to seek feedback from a handful of crypto users.We'd love to have you join our server and contribute your ideas.Link to the server: https://discord.gg/PAw5GhM3As an early adopter, you will be collecting some cool goodies.Thanks
